name: GKSavedGame
desc: An object that represents a file containing saved game data.

items.name: func loadData(completionHandler: ((Data?, Error?) -> Void)?)
items.desc: Loads the game data from the file.

items.name: var name: String?
items.desc: The name of the saved game.

items.name: var modificationDate: Date?
items.desc: The date when you saved the game data or modified it.

items.name: var deviceName: String?
items.desc: The name of the device that the player used to save the game.
